column5: I have been trying to find out some information about Watts Pond in Paris Ontario but no luck... does anyone here know anything about it... what the lake is like, types of fish in it(if any) and stuff like that?  Thanks in advance!  Derrick

Its a fair size pond,I beleive there is only catfish and panfish there.Its been a while since I scowered that hood.From what I recall, there is a path to the pond,you can see the pond from the rd side.Im not sure if its private property now or not.I know one side was at the time.I beleive coming from brantford going up the rd, it was on the right side.The path ends at a point in the pond.Thats all I can recall.
Thanks a lot, anymore info guys would be awesome!
I heard that it may have dried up. If you find out different let me know
I will check it out in the spring, i would be nice to find somewhere close to home where i can catch some fish!
